name: invent
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: invent
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to design and/or create something that has never been made before

example.eg: The first safety razor was invented by company founder King C. Gillette in 1903.
example.egtrans: 第一把安全剃刀由公司创始人金‧坎普‧吉列于1903年发明。

dsense.name: invent
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to create a reason, excuse, story, etc. that is not true, usually to deceive someone

example.eg: But I didn't invent the story - everything I told you is true.
example.egtrans: 但我没有胡编——我告诉你的都是真的。
